name: Retail Dominatrix (CleansingKaschmir)
description: Retail Dominatrix is a game about working in retail and disciplining indecent customers. The player assumes the role of a retail worker and finds itself exposed to frameworks of power and subjugation. The course of the narrative diverges in multiple ways from here on: Corporate retail madness either leads to complete obedience and total loss of individuality or in you sabotaging your retail overlords and bullying customers with psychological readings based on their textile choices.
